channel.title: Patriotic on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Patriotic on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Sputnik
item.description:
correction: it is not a chimps virus but I find that idea too entertaining still

So I got a shot of the vaccine Sputnik-V (I hope :).

Anyway I got a fever now as normal reaction. Basically I got a modified chimpanzee virus inside which is fun aspect of it.

Another interesting aspect is that I got it at the same day (I hope :) as the first citizen of the country.
